title: Surinamese Chicken Curry with Roti
description: A flavorful and hearty Surinamese chicken curry featuring tender chicken, potatoes, and warming spices, served with heated roti plates.
steps: Mix the chicken with 1 tbsp of the homemade masala mix, salt, and a drizzle of oil. Let marinate for 30 minutes.
Heat oil in a large pan and sauté the chopped onions until golden.
Add the garlic and ginger, then incorporate the marinated chicken and brown it on all sides.
Sprinkle in the remaining masala mix and stir well.
Add the chopped tomato and cook until softened.
Pour in the chicken broth and coconut milk (if using) along with the potatoes, then simmer for 20-25 minutes until the potatoes are tender.
Adjust the salt and add a whole scotch bonnet for a mild heat (remove after 5 minutes).
Serve hot with heated frozen roti plates.
